extendedInfo.description: Become the Casanova of the century and learn how to charm the ladies in Mr.Extravagant! Tired of working all day long? No time to meet girls? Time to hit the Clubs! In the world of Mr. Extravagant, you'll forget all your troubles!Gamble in the Casino and on the markets to raise money for more dates.. What are you waiting for? The city yours! What's Mr. Extravagant all about?Steal hearts!  - There are 15 beautiful ladies for you to seduce. Sweet talk them into loving you! Are you a betting man?- Are you dreaming of making a fortune? Make easy money in the Casino and on stocks. Take care of yourself! - There are more than 100 items thatâll make you tops with the ladies! Raise your appeal until they can't ignore you!The Cars of your dreams!- Sports cars, limousines, classic sedan, and even a Supercar! Now the ride you've always wanted is yours for the taking!Easy games are the most fun! - Say no to complicated games! Enjoy easy, simple, stress-free gameplay!Constant updates!- Patience is sour, but its fruit is sweet, right?
